comment: Super great professor. Has engaging lectures and is very mindful of sensitive subjects in the class. Only 3 tests, including the final, but all are very strait forward. All assignments are easily doable as long as you read the notes or listen to lecture.

I had this class as a Hybrid but she was still an amazing Prof! She makes her lectures engaging and interesting. She is also very kind and understanding of any problems you might have. Her tests are easy! just make sure you study and go to her review sessions.

What an amazing professor! I loved her lectures. As long as you paid attention in class you really could get by without reading the textbook. She gives study guides for all 3 exams and the final was non cumulative. Great class

The class was pretty straight forward. Tests are easy and the homework assignments due one a week were pretty easy. My only complaint is that she takes FOREVER to grade exams. Aside from that, she a pretty solid choice. Just show up to class and take half decent notes, study the study guide a couple days before the exam and you got it.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Professor Risi is an okay teacher. The textbook is online. Homework is basically the learning curve on the launchpad. You can turn in homework late.

She's great. Take her if you are considering it. Attendance is not mandatory but she does use lecture questions on exams. Her lectures are not boring and class is not a drag. She's a funny very typical Millenial professor. Wish I could take her for every psych class

She's a fanstastic professor, I think this is her first year, too. She's honest with us when it comes to her own issues with mental health and jokes around a lot. Definitely take her, especially as a Psych minor. You will struggle on the (in person) test and online quizzes if you don't show up as she adds definitions and examples to the slides.
